headline: FirstEnergy Announces Proposed Offering of $950 Million of Convertible Senior Notes Due 2029 and $850 Million of Convertible Senior Notes Due 2031
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) ("FirstEnergy") announced today that it intends to offer, subject to market and other conditions, $950 million aggregate principal amount of convertible senior notes due 2029 (such series, the "2029 Notes") and $850 million aggregate principal amount of convertible senior notes due 2031 (such series, the "2031 Notes" and, together with the 2029 Notes, the "Notes") in a private placement under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act"). FirstEnergy
